Trade/Device Name(s): CLEVER CHOICE Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CLEVER CHOICE Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites by people with diabetes mellitus at home and healthcare professionals, as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates
